author: ChatGPT
content: Here are some alternative phrases in English that might be easier to understand for a wider audience: 1. "Pre-Event Recording" 2. "Continuous Recording" 3. "Automatic Event Capture" 4. "Event-Triggered Recording" 5. "Always-On Recording" These phrases convey the idea of capturing footage before or after an event occurs, which is the essence of buffered recording, in a simpler and more intuitive way.
